title: Introduction to Python Programming
course_details: This course covers the basics of Python programming language including data types, control structures, functions, and more.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
course_details: Learn the fundamentals of web development including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Machine Learning Basics
course_details: An introduction to machine learning algorithms and techniques.

title: Graphic Design Fundamentals
course_details: Learn the basics of graphic design including color theory, typography, and layout.

title: Digital Marketing Essentials
course_details: An overview of digital marketing strategies, including SEO, SEM, and social media marketing.

title: Financial Planning for Beginners
course_details: Learn the basics of personal finance, budgeting, and investment strategies.

title: Photography Fundamentals
course_details: An introduction to photography techniques including composition, lighting, and exposure.

title: Data Analysis with Excel
course_details: Learn how to analyze and visualize data using Microsoft Excel.

title: English Literature Survey
course_details: An overview of major works and themes in English literature from different periods.
